title: Meta Spokesperson Denies Report of CEO Zuckerberg Stepping Down Next Year
description: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg testifies during a remote video hearing held by subcommittees of the U.S. House of Representatives Energy and Commerce Committee on "Social Media's Role in Promoting Extremism and Misinformation" in Washington on March 25, 2021. (U.S. House of Representatives Energy and Commerce Committee/Handout via Reuters)

title: New Visa Card Features Personal Carbon Emissions Tracker
description: Credit cards in Orlando, Fla., on July 1, 2021. (John Raoux/AP Photo)

title: Bankman-Fried Pushed for Crypto Regulation in Weeks Leading Up to FTX Bankruptcy
description: Samuel Bankman-Fried, founder and CEO of FTX, testifies during a Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry hearing about "Examining Digital Assets: Risks, Regulation, and Innovation," on Capitol Hill in Washington, DC, on Feb. 9, 2022. (SAUL LOEB/AFP via Getty Images)
